item.title: Discord Interface Zoom
item.description:
Just a quick note — after every update, my zoom level preferences in Discord get reset to default. Annoying, right? What makes it even worse is that the desktop app doesn’t have a zoom slider for DPI adjustments.

So, every time this happens, I find myself Ecosiyng (because who needs Google anymore?) the same thing over and over. Turns out, the fix is super simple:

Just use:

  • Ctrl + "+" to zoom in
  • Ctrl + "-" to zoom out

That’s it. No hidden settings or complicated tweaks. Simple as that!
